DOC.detailed_description: The surgery third molar usually associate important post-surgical sequela . The damage cause tissue bone may result considerable pain , edema trismus . The symptoms start gradually , peak 2 day extraction . The use medication dexamethasone diclofenac associate codeine may support prevention post-surgical pain . This clinical trial aim compare pre-emptive effect dexamethasone diclofenac associate codeine prevent pain , edema limit mouth opening extraction third molar .
